UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Highly potent antimicrobial modified peptides derived from the Acinetobacter baumannii phage endolysin LysAB2.
Literature.Author: Peng SY, You RI, Lai MJ, Lin NT, Chen LK, Chang KC
